source.fa68907b:
name = "Markus"
age = 50
height = 200

print("My name is " + name + ". My age is " + str(age) + ". My height is " + str(height) + ".")
print("My name is {}. My age is {}. My height {}.".format(name, age, height))
print(f"My name is {name}. My age is {age}. My height {height}.")
